attributes.action: No Proposed Tax on Unheathly Food
attributes.additional_details:
The government is proposing adding additional tax on 'unhealthy foods' to reduce potential obesity and potential health problems etc.

If a person chooses what they want to eat, it will not make them lighter, it will simply make their wallet/purse lighter!

This country costs too much to start with, stop adding additional charges to one's already expensive lives.
